name: Barbie Lay
text: First time ordering today, via door dash. It was phenomenal! The toppings were awesome, I loved the wood-fired crust, and the price! We both got our own 11‚Äù pizza (with different toppings). We thoroughly enjoyed both of them. Also, big plus for it not being greasy and offering vegan chorizo! Definitely will order again!!

name: Mathew Riva
text: Hands down love this place. Came for lunch with a friend as my first time and can‚Äôt wait to go back. I added about everything I love and then some to my pizza. Employee was really friendly even brought the pizza out to us at our table. It was fantastically delicious!

name: Eltoreon Hawkins

text: First time eating here and it‚Äôs awesome! Definitely mix half lemonade and blood orange together, it‚Äôs almost as good as Dr. Pepper.. Almost. The workers were very nice as well and I want to say thank you to them for being patient while I was just staring at the menu.

name: laveatria Vanhook
text: Long wait in line 15-20 minutes. Several people behind me complained about the wait and left. Nice staff,manager was pleasant at checkout. Was not to happy they were out of greek salad and salad dressing. The staff gave me the remainder of ‚Ä¶More

text: One of my favorite Blaze pizza locations. Staff is always on point and friendly. Food is always super delicious.

name: Kevin Bishop
text: What I enjoy the most about Blaze Pizza is the create your own pizza on their menu! I would definitely recommend Blaze Pizza to anyone wanting unique pizza experience!

name: April Kriss
text: Frustrated that this location is apparently temporarily closed and it is not listed as such on their website or Google. When you call it just says out of business. Excited for it to reopen but what kind of business decision is that to frustrate your customers.

name: Karie S
text: Very good! They offer key I crust. Was really good

name: Jolanda Jackson
text: So far Im in love!! Fresh crust, great ingredients,  build it your way pizza!!! Great Manager, staff and grest atmosphere!!!

name: Beth anderson
